website_summaries.verdict: With a petite elegance that brings character to just about any space, this LED mini chandelier is a true delight and a conversation piece.
pros: Silver-painted wrought iron frame has antique flair
Beautiful glass crystal pendants and beads
Ceiling kit and matching plate included
cons: Some components are plastic, but for the price and fantastic look, you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: For less than $120...
customer_reviews.text: For less than $120, it was definitely worth it for my girls' bathroom. Does it look plastiky? Yes, it does if you're taking a close look. If you want a high-end look, then you better spend the extra $$$ for it; otherwise you'll be disappointed with the "look" of the chandelier. If you want something cute but don't want to spend a lot of $$, I highly suggest this chandelier. I gave it four stars because my hubby hot wired it, and it wasn't easy installing it.
customer_reviews.author: mommyofmany

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Dresses the room up
customer_reviews.text: Looked easy to install as I watched my husband. This has made the bathroom so elegant!! Love love it
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase !!! 5 stars !!!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is GORGEOUS !!! So elegant ! Such a wonderful piece for any room ! Stunning ! Made well and shipped within a week . Would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but have unpacked it and it is beautiful. I will be hanging this above a free ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not hung this chandelier yet, but have unpacked it and it is beautiful. I will be hanging this above a free standing tub in my master bath and it's absolutely well made, the silver has streaks of gold through it so it placates the silver making finish less bright than bright chrome which is exactly what I was looking for as my faucets are all brushed nickle. It is beautiful just in the box so once hanged I know it will be much more beautiful. I'll post pictures once in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks a lot better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Looks a lot better than I thought, and the price is very reasonable. The customer service fantastic! 4 “crystals” were damaged in the package. I called C.S. A very kind woman voice picked up the phone, apologized for the mistake, and in a few days I received 10 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Katalin Laufer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier is perfect for what I need. I hung it on a hook, it was not installed. It is small and has a nice gold color. The only problem I had with it was when I pulled it out of the box, some of the metal loops that were supposed to hold the crystals were pulled out a bit and I had to use pliers to fix them. Other than that it was pretty simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Turner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, classy looking, cottage decor.
customer_reviews.text: Love these little chandeliers. (We bought two.) They went in a hallway with 40's green and cabbage rose wallpaper and fit beautifully. The white frame goes with the distressed white accents in my area. My opinion is: these would look great in a cottage, bedroom, bathroom or an enclosed porch. Some assembly was required, (putting prisms on, etc) which we knew, but the time and effort was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: denise d.

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% Glass
customer_reviews.text: Bought and returned AT MY EXPENCE!! Some of the "glass" is acrylic plastic. "Antique gold" is just badly painted gold and brown.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas West

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Such a great accent to our room. It's a nice antique gold. Not bright yellow or too coppery. We use bulbs on one side only, so it casts more shadows and designs. It takes a while to assemble all of the crystals, but it's not difficult. Definitely assemble them before you hang it up!
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and well worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! Packed carefully and so well! You will not be disappointed. I Bought for the plug in option! All hardware included and even extra beads given. Very thoughtful. Great customer service and prompt shipping!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful...easy to Assembled. Delivered much earlier than expected👍🏻So happy and satisfied it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Show stopper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ADORE in my new kitchen !! Easy to assemble. Only complaint is missing several pieces. Can the seller please send missing pieces ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looks so cute and is a good quality. We put it in my granddaughters nursery ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks so cute and is a good quality. We put it in my granddaughters nursery and it adds the right girly sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: Terry P.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. Only problem was it came with some missing and broken Crystals. I contacted seller and they shipped out parts plus extra. It’s beautiful. This is not a fancy expense chandelier. However most of the crystals are actual glass and it’s a nice finish. I got the antiqued silver and it’s nice. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cmassey

customer_reviews.title: I love the chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I love the chandelier, it is better quality than expected. However, there were missing crystals and one was broken. Considering the amount of sparkle it puts out a few missing crystals isn't noticeable to anyone else. I do recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: sSm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am a designer & love this! It is a great deal. It can be both plugged in & hard wired.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Cute Chandalier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little Chandalier for my daughters room. We love it and it is very elegant for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: CaDenney

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional. !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier. !!! Came quick and mostly assembled . Had to add some of the crystals but came with very detailed instructions and even extras ! Highly recommend this chandelier. !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Snyder

customer_reviews.title: crystals don't look fake or plasticy like other chandeliers I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, crystals don't look fake or plasticy like other chandeliers I've seen. Great price and so sparkly!
customer_reviews.author: linz0428

customer_reviews.title: The chandelier brings a beautiful ambience and elegance to my bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my chandelier. It is the perfect size and add a special elegance to my freestanding bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Delphime Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it! It's perfect for over the chair in my bedroom. My husband did complain that it was a pain to put together though.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA A NOTTELMANN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fixture
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful for the price, looks amazing in my office. I picked the right one!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A Kahle

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous! Cant get anything better for this price!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more pleased with this purchase! I was looking for the perfect gold chandelier for my daughters nursery (with perfect price to match) and can honestly say this chandelier is absolutely beautiful and couldn't be more pleased with the quality! I had actually purchased a more expensive Pottery Barn Kids chandelier first and was so disappointed in all the plastic beading. The crystals on this chandelier are beautiful. It was easy to put together, and we paid an electrician to hardwire it for us. I was also worried that itmight be a little small for the room but the sizing is perfect. Do not hesitate with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sharlie Drake

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! We love it ! Took time to assemble just have time and patience it’s worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Amo O

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier! It is perfect over our tub in our master bath. It's just enough glam and elegance at the same time. The size is also perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Obendorf

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: STUNNING!!!!! Hung it over my kitchen table, very shabby chic. Perfect as there is no existing hardwiring above it so I wanted a swag for the hooks that are already there. ALL REAL GLASS CRYSTALS!!! Heavy iron and even larger than anticipated. One problem with a bubbly crystal which was immediately resolved as my feedback was solicited before I had a chance to contact Platinum Home Designs. Talk about AWESOME customer service from them and Amazon!!! JUST THRILLED....I must say I am perplexed by a couple of feedbacks as this is just as described. Maybe they got something other than this, or perhaps works for the competition. hmmm??????
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gronemeyer

customer_reviews.title: I love this mini chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini chandelier. Just perfect for my dinning room-not too big, not too small & looks elegant. Very fast delivery & well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely happy and in love with my gold chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely happy and in love with my gold chandelier. I would definitely purchase again and recommend the chandelier to others for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Boyd

customer_reviews.title: love this light
customer_reviews.text: love this light! It was a little more boozy gold then I expected, but I, hung it on a tree outside, took a small paint brush and gold paint and brushed it on, turned out fab!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this chandelier!!! It was perfect for my new closet to be...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The chandelier is perfectly beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier is perfectly beautiful!!!! It meets all my expectations. I love it. Perfect for my needs. Thank you for making such a lovely fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Canterbury

customer_reviews.title: Beautful!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!!! I have a clothing boutique and it made the room look so elegant. Looks very expensive. Will probably buy 2 more for the fitting room.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Great chandelier and looks perfect in our master bath. Very well constructed and lots of bling "glass crystals" too! I highly recommend this chandalier.
customer_reviews.author: TRN

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! Exactly what I was looking for for my daughters nursery! Great price, wonderful quality and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful little light. I have this handing as part of my window display in my boutique and it's stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Jones

customer_reviews.title: This chandelier is perfect for the vanity space in the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is perfect for the vanity space in the bathroom. Unfortunately, it did arrive damaged, but once the company was contacted I received a replacement in less than a week. It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: G Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier! It is very sparkly & fit perfect in the space i purchased it for. I hung it up as a plug in light.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Paige Wielezynski

customer_reviews.title: Modern with vintage charm
customer_reviews.text: Mix of modern and vintage charm! I used this chandelier in my walk in closet and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Steinhilber

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived broken! The ornate metal pieces were broken off!
customer_reviews.author: Melony.  Candler

customer_reviews.title: Prettier than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. I enjoy it every time I see it!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Great value’
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is amazing. So many gorgeous glass crystals and the size is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Gainor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and very pretty, I loved ! Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Bragança

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! Exactly what I was looking for. Great price and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my chandelier for my baby girls room
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my chandelier for my baby girls room. It had a plug on it but was easy converted. All pieces were there and more. Love the gold color. We shall see how wel it last!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Warner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of my Chandelier
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: This was even more beautiful than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was even more beautiful than I expected. Great price. Easy assembly. Well packaged. Easy installation. Enough cord to use multiple ways. Extra crystals just in case.
customer_reviews.author: KK HART

customer_reviews.title: See Return Policy before buying.
customer_reviews.text: Looked very cheap and gaudy. Color was not what I expected. Actually it was too big & bulky. Returned product and paid half of what it cost to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: SALLY B.

product_meta.title: Amalfi Decor 4 Light LED Crystal Beaded Chandelier, Mini Wrought Iron K9 Glass Pendant Light Fixture Vintage Nursery Kids Room Dimmable Plug in Hanging Ceiling Lamp, Silver
feature_bullets: 【HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS】UL/CUL certified. Hand-crafted wrought iron frame painted in a silver color and brushed with an antique style finish. Decorated with authentic K9 quality glass crystal pendants and plastic beads
【GREAT FOR ANY ROOM】This chandelier is perfect for events, and displaying in the foyer, entry, kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, dining room, girls’ room, hallway, over island, powder room, and patio
【PLUG-IN READY】Ready to hang with a 15-ft plug-in electrical cord, and a 12-ft hanging metal chain. Matching ceiling hooks are included. *Hard-wire parts and kit is included for ceiling mount display
【COMPATIBLE LIGHT BULBS】Compatible with 3-Watt to 5-Watt LED E12 candelabra base light bulbs, or 25-Watt incandescent E12 candelabra base bulbs also works

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
